decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers 131 Rev. P2, 132 Rev. P2, 133 Rev. P5 and 135 Rev. P5.'
To ensure that the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two Saved UDP Policies (November 2012) and the London Plan (2016).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Condition 2, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 40642/APP/2019/2369 must be adhered to as per that permission.
The description of development (Ref:40642/APP/2019/2369) is hereby amended to:

Part two storey, part single storey side/rear extension, alterations to existing two storey front extension and conversion of roofspace to habitable use to include, conversion of both sides of roof from gable to hip end, raising of ridge height, rear dormer and 4 rooflights
description: S96a (Non Material Amendment) to Planning Decision Reference 40642/APP/2019/2369 for part two storey, part single storey side/rear extension, two storey front extension and conversion of roofspace to habitable use to include conversion of both sides of roof from gable to hip end, raising of ridge height, rear dormer and 4 rooflights.  This application proposes minor adjustments to the description of development and the wording of Condition 2 attached to the Planning Decision.
